page.title: 17Churches, Murroes area
page.content:
The main church in the Murroes area is the Church of Scotland.The minister is Mrs Helen Johnstone and she was the {first lady minister}in Dundee.Before Mrs Johnstone there was a minister called Mr Kidd.In 1983 Tealing Church united with Murroes and was then linked with Auchterhouse.Tealing Church is being turned into a{Church } {Heritage}Centre.On a Sunday about 40 are in church,but altogether there are about four hundred members.At {Communion}there are about two hundred people.Communion is held twice every year,once in May and once in October.
There are a small number of Roman Catholics and Episcopalians in the area and they tend to worship in Broughty Ferry.
